data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 2, Throw-in high up the field for Kawasaki in Suita.
Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 5, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gamba's Kosuke Onose gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 5, It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Gamba attack but Takashi Usami's header doesn't find the target.
Kawasaki have a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Miki Yamane (Kawasaki) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Suita, Miki Yamane of Kawasaki is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Kawasaki have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 9, Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
In the minute 12, Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In Suita, Genta Miura (Gamba) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Gamba, close to Kawasaki's area.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Gamba throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
In the minute 18, Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Koichiro Fukushima blows against Kawasaki's Miki Yamane for offside.
Gamba's Kosuke Onose fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
In the minute 20, Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kawasaki's Reo Hatate misses with an attempt on goal.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Gamba a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Important block from the Kawasaki defence as Yosuke Ideguchi fires in a strike for Gamba.
Throw-in Gamba.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
In the minute 24, Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
Yu Kobayashi (Kawasaki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kawasaki's Ryota Ohshima breaks free at Panasonic Stadium Suita. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 27, Koichiro Fukushima awards Gamba a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Gamba.
Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 32, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Gamba's half.
In the minute 35, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In Suita Gamba's Kazuma Watanabe is caught offside.
Kosuke Onose for Gamba drives towards goal at Panasonic Stadium Suita. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 40, Gamba to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Kawasaki.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
In the minute 43, Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Kawasaki.
Koichiro Fukushima will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Gamba have a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Suita.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Kawasaki are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Gamba pushes forward through Takashi Usami, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Suita Kawasaki drive forward through Yasuto Wakizaka. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 48, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Ryota Ohshima.
Kaoru Mitoma instrumental with a fine assist.
The away team replace Yasuto Wakizaka with Kaoru Mitoma.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Kawasaki.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in Suita.
Gamba push forward at Panasonic Stadium Suita and Kazuma Watanabe gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kawasaki defence.
Shu Kurata is replacing Yuji Ono for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Shogo Taniguchi for Kawasaki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 62, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Gamba's half.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
In the minute 65, Kawasaki are whistled for offside.
The home team have replaced Kazuma Watanabe with Yasuhito Endo. This is the second substitution made today by Tsuneyasu Miyamoto.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto is making the team's third substitution at Panasonic Stadium Suita with Yuya Fukuda replacing Shinya Yajima.
In the minute 67, Can Gamba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kawasaki's half?
Gamba drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 69, Kawasaki push upfield but Koichiro Fukushima quickly pulls them for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 72, Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Kawasaki make their second substitution with Hidemasa Morita replacing Reo Hatate.
Hokuto Shimoda is replacing Ryota Ohshima for the away team.
In the minute 76, Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Gamba throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Ao Tanaka of Kawasaki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 78, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 80, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Patric is on a sub for Kosuke Onose for Gamba.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kawasaki's Kaoru Mitoma gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gamba defender.
In the minute 81, Gamba to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Kawasaki needs to be cautious. Gamba have an attacking throw-in.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Gamba just outside Kawasaki's area.
In the minute 85, Leandro Damiao is on a sub for Yu Kobayashi for Kawasaki.
Gamba's Yasuhito Endo gets in a shot on goal at Panasonic Stadium Suita. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 86, Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Gamba, close to Kawasaki's area.
Gamba drive upfield and Patric gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kawasaki defender.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
In the minute 87, Kawasaki are in shooting range from this free kick.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Takashi Usami for Gamba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Kawasaki at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Gamba in the half of Kawasaki.
At Panasonic Stadium Suita the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Gamba a goal kick.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Gamba.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In Suita Kawasaki attack through Leandro Damiao. The finish is off target, however.
Gamba have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
Toru Oniki (Kawasaki) is making a fifth substitution, with Taisei Miyashiro replacing Akihiro Ienaga.
